mapper.select: select teamno from (select * from teaminfo order by teamdate desc)team where rownum=1 and teamname=#{teamname}
select count(*) from userteam where userno=#{userno}
select teamno from userteam where userno=#{userno}
select count(*) from userteam where teamno=#{teamno}
select teamno from teaminfo where teamname=#{teamname}
select teamno,teamname , teamintro , teamloc , teamdate,teamlogo,(select count(*) from userteam where teamno=#{teamno}) teamcount from teaminfo where teamno=#{teamno}
select u.usernname, u.userposition, u.userage, u.userloc, u.userrole from userinfo u natural join userteam t where teamno=#{teamno}
mapper.update: update teaminfo set teamname=#{teamname} , teamloc=#{teamloc} , teamintro=#{teamintro} , teamlogo=#{teamlogo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where teamno=#{teamno}
mapper.delete: delete teaminfo where teamno in(select teamno from userteam where userno=#{userno})
mapper.select: select f.userno as userno, p.userno as postuser, p.category, f.formcontent, u.usernname, f.formno, p.recruitstate, p.postno, f.acheck, f.bcheck from post p, userinfo u, form f where (p.userno=#{userno} and u.userno = f.userno and f.postno = p.postno) order by f.formno desc
select teambpm , treview , reviewdate from teamreview where teamno=#{teamno} order by reviewdate desc
select avg(teambpm) from teamreview where teamno=#{teamno}
select count(*) from teamreview where teamno=#{teamno}
select teamlogo from teaminfo where teamno = #{teamno}
